text: However he went out and began to proclaim it freely, spreading the news,But he did go to the priest, which resulted in the following evaluation—Luke makes this point clearly in his parallel account. That said, however, I can sympathize with that leper—he had good reason to sound off! But it did increase the pressure on Jesus. so that He was no longer able to enter a town openly, but remained outside in deserted places; yet they kept coming to Him from all over.There were an awful lot of sick people who all of a sudden had hope.
